[Item]

Prerequisites Tier 2 with the Envoy's Alliance; You own a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Wayfinder]{Wayfinder}

Cost 2 Fame

Action Free action

Effect You have modified your @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Wayfinder]{Wayfinder} to resonate with your allies' actions, allowing you to better help them in times of need. When you slot this boon, you apply its benefits to one @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Wayfinder]{Wayfinder} in your possession, granting you a special free action ability when the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Wayfinder]{Wayfinder} is invested and in your possession.

You can activate this ability as a free action before you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Aid]{Aid} an ally. If you roll a success on the check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Aid]{Aid}, you instead get a critical success.

You can safely use this benefit once per adventure.You can attempt to use it a second time, overcharging the wayfinder at the risk of destroying it. When you do so, roll a DC 10 flat check. On a success, the wayfinder is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Broken]{Broken}. On a failure, the wayfinder is destroyed. Trying to overcharge it twice destroys it.
